title: The Legend of Korra: Friends for Life / How to Train Your Dragon / Plants Vs. Zombies
description: Avatars, dragons, and zombies? What could be more friendly for all ages than original tales from these prime Dark Horse worlds? Nothing. For Free Comic Book Day 2016, take a journey with the Avatar from The Legend of Korra, the dragon riders from How to Train Your Dragon, and the fun dead of Plants vs. Zombies!
author: Michael Dante DiMartino
